Publication Title: Single-cell dissection of tumor microenvironmental response and resistance to cancer therapy
Publication Keywords: Combination therapy, Tumor Microenvironment, Therapeutic Response, Single-cell Genomics
Publication Abstract: Cancer treatment strategies have evolved significantly over the years, with chemotherapy, targeted therapy, and immunotherapy as major pillars. Each modality leads to unique treatment outcomes by interacting with the tumor microenvironment (TME), which imposes a fundamental selective pressure on cancer progression.
